Header.title: Connecting properties and people
Header.paragraph: A complete solution for all services related to your property, gathered in one app.

Why2: Custom branding and white-labeling for your property
AI-powered tools to streamline management and enhance living
Community features to build stronger connections
Local deals and services to support nearby businesses

Services.name: Tailored and White-Labeled for Your Property
Services.text: Make your property stand out with a fully white-labeled app. Living App lets you customize everything—from logos and colors to features—so it feels like an integral part of your property's brand. Provide a unique, professional experience for your residents while keeping your identity front and center.

Services.name: Stay Connected With Neighbours
Services.text: Build a stronger community through photos, updates, and events shared in the community feed. Connect with neighbors using private chats and interest-based groups. Stay informed with real-time push notifications for important announcements from property managers, keeping you up-to-date on essential updates and changes.

Services.name: Digital Services Booking
Services.text: Plan ahead, manage your time, and access amenities with ease—right from your phone. With Living App, residents can reserve common spaces, gym classes, tools, or bikes directly from their phones. The app shows real-time availability and booking updates, allowing users to plan ahead with ease. Property managers can customize booking rules, monitor usage, and manage resources efficiently, ensuring everyone gets fair access to shared amenities.

Services.name: Plan Social Gatherings
Services.text: Host events like BBQs, game nights, or community meet-ups. Residents can RSVP, and property managers can easily keep everyone informed.

Services.name: Instant Help When You Need It
Services.text: Message property staff instantly for servicing issues or inquiries. Real-time chat ensures quick responses and seamless communication

Services.name: Support Locals And Save More
Services.text: Enjoy discounts and deals from nearby restaurants, shops, and services. Save money while exploring what your community has to offer.

Testimonials.text: "Living App has transformed how we manage our properties. The easy booking system and resident communication tools have saved us hours of admin work every week. Thank you again!."
Testimonials.name: David P.

Testimonials.text: "Great App, makes it simple to stay connected with my neighbors and book amenities. The AI bot even helped me fix a minor maintenance issue myself! Good coding from a fellow developer."
Testimonials.name: Johnathan C.

Testimonials.text: "Very smooth onboarding and integration of our own app, this has really elevated our brand and simplified our operations. Our residents feel like they're part of a high-tech, luxury community. Thanks and great work."
Testimonials.name: Johan S.

Testimonials.text: "Living App has been a game-changer for our property. The digital services booking feature has made it incredibly easy for residents to reserve amenities, and the AI bot has been a huge help with maintenance requests. The app has really improved communication and made our operations more efficient."
Testimonials.name: Malin P.

Testimonials.text: "The onboarding process was so smooth, and the Living App's team has been there every step of the way. The custom branding makes it feel like the app was made just for us. It definitely added value to our Health Center Project!"
Testimonials.name: Özer E.

Testimonials.text: "As a resident, I love how Living App makes everything so convenient. The digital booking system is fantastic, and the community features have helped me meet some great neighbors. The local deals are an awesome bonus too!"
Testimonials.name: Lisa S.

Features.title: Custom Branded App
Features.text: Fully customizable app with your property's branding, logos and features for a unique branded experience.

Features.title: Stay Connected With Neighbours
Features.text: Connect with neighbors through shared photos, chats, groups and events. Get real-time updates on community announcements.

Features.title: Digital Services Booking
Features.text: Book common spaces, amenities and services directly from your phone. Real-time availability and updates make planning easy.

Features.title: Plan Social Gatherings
Features.text: Host events like BBQs, game nights, or community meet-ups. Residents can RSVP, and property managers can easily keep everyone informed.

Features.title: Instant Help When You Need It
Features.text: Message property staff instantly for servicing issues or inquiries. Real-time chat ensures quick responses and seamless communication

Features.title: Support Locals And Save More
Features.text: Enjoy discounts and deals from nearby restaurants, shops, and services. Save money while exploring what your community has to offer.

Features.title: Payment Tracking
Features.text: Track rental income, payment plans and receipts with ease. Stay on top of all financial transactions through our intuitive payment management system.

Features.title: AI-Powered Issue Reporting
Features.text: Report maintenance issues with photos and get AI-powered suggestions for DIY fixes. Track request status with real-time notifications.

Features.title: 24/7 AI Assistant
Features.text: Get instant help anytime with our AI assistant for bookings, rules and condo questions.
